name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 9+ years of extensive experience in **.NET**, **C#**, **ASP.Net**, **SQL Server**, **JavaScript**, and **HTML**. Proficient in developing and maintaining **Web services** while leveraging **T-SQL** for optimized database interactions. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a proven track record in **performance tuning** and executing effective **unit testing** strategies. Demonstrates exceptional communication abilities to facilitate collaboration across teams, coupled with profound expertise in enterprise applications integrating **Salesforce**, **SAP**, **Oracle**, **PeopleSoft**, and **Siebel**. Adaptable in designing solutions and leading intricate software projects, while ensuring high-quality deliverables.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed robust web applications utilizing **.NET 7**, **C#**, and **ASP.NET**, enhancing overall platform performance by 25%.
- Designed SQL queries in **SQL Server** and utilized **T-SQL** for optimized data retrieval, achieving a reduction in execution time by **20%**.
- Implemented web services using **XML** and **JavaScript**, ensuring efficient communication between frontend and backend systems.
- Integrated single sign-on (SSO) solutions with **SAML** to enhance security and user experience across applications.
- Developed high-performance applications with a focus on **technical problem solving** and **performance tuning**, addressing user needs effectively.
- Collaborated in the design and architecture decision-making processes, leveraging strong **analytical skills** to identify system improvements.
- Conducted unit testing to validate code functionality and performance, adhering to best practices in software development.
- Communicated effectively with cross-functional teams to capture requirements and feedback, ensuring alignment with business objectives.
- Leveraged **Salesforce**, **SAP**, and other enterprise applications for seamless integration, maximizing system potential.
- Utilized **JavaScript**, **HTML**, and **CSS** for creating dynamic user interfaces that foster engaging user experiences.

Utilized **.NET Core**, **C#**, and **SQL Server** to design and develop high-performance web applications, resulting in a 15% increase in team collaboration efficiency.
Implemented **T-SQL** for optimized database management and reduced query times, enhancing overall application performance by 25%.
Built and deployed RESTful web services to connect with various third-party tools like **Salesforce**, **SAP**, and **Oracle**, ensuring seamless interactions across platforms.
Developed unit tests and performed performance tuning which reduced production deployment errors by **30%**.
Crafted dynamic user interfaces using **JavaScript**, **HTML**, and **web services** that significantly improved user engagement by **25%**.
Led technical problem-solving initiatives that enhanced system reliability and facilitated smooth integration with **SSO** and **SAML** for improved security measures.
Conducted code reviews and mentoring with junior developers to elevate team skills and productivity, ensuring adherence to best practices and coding standards.
Collaborated effectively with stakeholders to gather requirements and set development timelines, achieving project milestones on schedule with a **100%** on-time delivery rate.
Created analytical reports and dashboards leveraging **XML** for enhanced project tracking and decision-making.
Ensured robust data handling and interaction by managing **MSSQL** databases and implementing effective data retrieval strategies.

- Developed and maintained software applications utilizing **.NET** and **C#**, ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front end.
- Enhanced database performance by optimizing **SQL Server** queries, improving execution time by **30%**.
- Implemented **web services** for seamless communication between applications, increasing interoperability across platforms.
- Utilized **JavaScript**, **HTML**, and **XML** to create dynamic user interfaces, enhancing user engagement by **25%**.
- Used **ASP.NET** for building scalable web applications, transitioning legacy systems to modern architectures.
- Participated in technical problem solving, leveraging analytical skills to troubleshoot issues and implement effective solutions.
- Conducted unit testing on new and existing features, contributing to a **40%** reduction in bug occurrences.
- Collaborated in cross-functional teams, utilizing strong communication skills to drive project success and ensure alignment with business objectives.
- Engaged in performance tuning initiatives, leading to improved application efficiency by **15%**.
- Delivered detailed technical documentation and user guides to facilitate knowledge transfer and best practices among team members.
